title: Functional Situationalism-Based Language Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language structures and professional fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening situational language use training in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret linguistic contexts in various professional situations with 80% accuracy using Relational Frame Theory (RFT)-based relational frame analysis
Learners can construct functional verbal responses in simulated environments repeatedly (≥3 times) per situation
Learners can reproduce language processing patterns similar to experts (≥75%) in VR-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
